00093 
00094 /* Returns the number of point of interests
00095  * 0 - lines are colinear
00096  * 1 - lines are coplanar, i1 is set to intersection
00097  * 2 - i1 and i2 are the nearest points on line 1 (v1, v2) and line 2 (v3, v4) respectively 
00098  * */
00099

00249 /****************************** Spherical Harmonics *************************/
00250 
00251 /* Uses 2nd order SH => 9 coefficients, stored in this order:
00252  * 0 = (0,0),
00253  * 1 = (1,-1), 2 = (1,0), 3 = (1,1),
00254  * 4 = (2,-2), 5 = (2,-1), 6 = (2,0), 7 = (2,1), 8 = (2,2) */
00255 
00256 MINLINE void zero_sh(float r[9]);
00257 MINLINE void copy_sh_sh(float r[9], const float a[9]);
00258 MINLINE void mul_sh_fl(float r[9], const float f);
00259 MINLINE void add_sh_shsh(float r[9], const float a[9], const float b[9]);
00260 
00261 MINLINE float eval_shv3(float r[9], const float v[3]);
00262 MINLINE float diffuse_shv3(float r[9], const float v[3]);
00263 MINLINE void vec_fac_to_sh(float r[9], const float v[3], const float f);
00264 MINLINE void madd_sh_shfl(float r[9], const float sh[3], const float f);
